SEARCH

Class StudentGraph

java.lang.Object
StudentGraph
public class StudentGraph extends Object
Represents the network of students as a weighted graph. Supports adding students, creating edges based on connection strength, and traversing the graph.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    StudentGraph.Edge
    Inner class representing a weighted edge between two students.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentGraph

      public StudentGraph(List<UniversityStudent> students)
      Constructs the graph from a list of students. Automatically adds all students as nodes and calculates edges between them.
      Parameters:
      students - A list of UniversityStudent objects to populate the graph.

  • Method Details

    • getNeighbors

      public List<StudentGraph.Edge> getNeighbors(UniversityStudent student)
      Retrieves the list of edges (neighbors) for a specific student.
      Parameters:
      student - The student whose neighbors are being requested.
      Returns:
      A list of Edge objects connecting the student to others.

    • getAllNodes

      public List<UniversityStudent> getAllNodes()
      Returns all students (nodes) in the graph.
      Returns:
      A list of all UniversityStudent objects in the graph.

    • displayGraph

      public void displayGraph()
      Prints a visual representation of the graph to the console. Useful for debugging and verification.
